programme.title: Racetrack, Part 17
programme.desc: Today, we’re featuring the British GT Championship and the European Truck Racing Championship.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: Once again it was time for the VLN Endurance Racing Championship. While the drivers were doing their test laps, we had a look behind the scenes and explored what went on in the pit lanes.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: The fourth race of the VLN season is usually regarded as a dress rehearsal for the 24-hour race. For the top teams and best drivers it is the last opportunity for a really thorough test.

programme.title: Trackmasters
programme.desc: We present the highlights of last week. The 24 hour race was exciting, as usual. In addition, we explored the 'Strong Man Run' and took a look at the tourist drivers

programme.title: BMW 503
programme.desc: The noble four-seater 503 convertible was one of BMWs most exclusive models in the 1950s. Many international sports and movie stars and other wealthy customers were fond of this sporty luxury vehicle.

programme.title: Volvo S90
programme.desc: It looks sportier than one might expect from the Swedes. The taillights frame the powerful looking rear. On the inside, the Volvo S90 impresses with the finest materials and soft nappa leather.

programme.title: Alfa Romeo 6C 2500SS
programme.desc: Founded in 1910, the iconic Italian car manufacturer Alfa Romeo experienced a very eventful history. Their 6C 2500 SS model is right in the middle of the company's more than 100-year history. It combined new technology with an early post-war appearance.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: Customised cars from the desert: in Ron's Garage in California, rolling works of art are created according to customer wishes. Plus: Mercedes-Benz transforms the G-Class into the ultimate G 63 AMG 6x6 survivalist's dream. And: the Brabus B63.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: MTM turns the RS6 into the RS6 R Clubsport. Also: Stefan Kalläne pimped a Volkswagen Lupo to the extreme. At the Tuning Expo Saarbrücken he looks for the hottest gadgets in the car tuning scene.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The Scirocco GT-R1 from Mathilda Racing, the Bentley GT3 R and the Volkswagen Golf R. The Scirocco is a complete conversion. The Bentley GT3 R is the street version of the current GT3 racer. And the Golf R is the most powerful Golf ever.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: In Dubai, the legendary super sports car police fleet is on the hunt for speeders and parking violators. Also: the Audi S8 MTM Talladega R. And: the Alpina D5 on the race track.

programme.title: Tuning
programme.desc: The BMW 3 Series, Nissan 370 Z or Citroen DS3 are usually considered everyday cars. But in the M version, as a Nismo or as a Musketier, things get down to business in terms of performance.

programme.title: Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10
programme.desc: The ice course on Lungauring, the Mitsubishi Lancer Evo 10 in winter training. Twelve participants in six Evos were taught the art of drifting with a four-wheel drive car. We accompanied a student on his first drifting experience.

programme.title: Toyota Corolla Levin
programme.desc: In 1970, the second generation Corolla was released in Japan. The sporty model version „Levin“, similar to the Volkswagen Golf GTI among the Corollas, was only made available in Japan and the United States.

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 1 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 2 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 3 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 4 of 5)

programme.title: Biker Lifestyle
programme.desc: Lake Faaker is both a popular holiday spot in Austria and also a place with a special tradition. In early September, the region is the destination for thousands of bikers who celebrate their big annual event, the European Bike Week. (Part 5 of 5)

programme.title: Harley-Davidson Trio
programme.desc: We took a look at three very different Harley-Davidson models. The versatile Switchback Dyna, the motorized wheelie bike Sportster 72, and the bad-boy motorcycle Softail Slim.

programme.title: KTM 990 Adventure
programme.desc: It's very big and mostly comes in orange: the KTM 990 Adventure. Over rough terrain it's often driven standing up. Today, the 990 is considered the off-road specialist among travel Enduros.

programme.title: Facel Vega Facellia
programme.desc: In the late 1950s, the Facel Vega Facellia was designed to compete with Porsche and Alfa Romeo and open a new market segment for the fledgling French luxury car company.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: If you decide to purchase the Volkswagen Polo GTI or Citroen's DS4 SoChic you neither have to give up convenience nor performance. Also: Nissan doesn't hold back when it comes to their luxury brand Infiniti. We took the Q50 hybrid RWD to the test.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Not only in the big cities it's a growing struggle for parking spots. . We took the BMW X6, the Citroen Cactus and the Smart forfour to town in order to find out how these cars would cope in this situation and surrounding.

programme.title: Perfect Ride
programme.desc: Cars with a rear-wheel drive are usually considered to be agile but also a bit capricious in regards to their handling. Does this also apply to the Porsche GT3 and the Smart? In addition: the sporty midsize sedan model range, BMW's 3 Series.

programme.title: The Dubai Police Force's Special Cars Unit
programme.desc: For the first time the Dubai Police special cars unit allows a TV crew to accompany their officers on patrol. These aren't normal police cars because this is not a normal city.

programme.title: Beradino
programme.desc: A „bella macchina“, a beautiful car - but not designed by masters like Bertone or Pininfarina. Johannes Paulussen from Neuss in Germany built the Beradino by hand.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: We test drove the Rallye Defender and examined how a Jeep Wrangler with only few modifications can double in price. Also: how does the Fiat Panda 4x4 fare in Iceland? Also: Land Rover's Bowler Defender and Volvo's 6-wheeler, the Laplander.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: We spent a day in snowy Austria with rally professional Niki Schelle in a Suzuki SX4 S-Cross. Also: why is the Mitsubishi Lancer Evolution perfect for drifting? And: Mercedes and Chrysler present their all-wheel concept cars.

programme.title: 4x4
programme.desc: We show how to have a lot of fun on gravel roads in a Subaru WRX STI. Also: in the 1990s, Ford had a successful go at rally competitions with the Ford Escort RS Cosworth. And: the Volkswagen Polo WRC shows its 4x4 skills.

programme.title: Arabella Classics
programme.desc: Rare Automobiles and stunning views! The Arabella Classics, one of the most exclusive Classic Car Rallies in Europe.

programme.title: Porsche Ruf RT35
programme.desc: Ruf RT35 may look like a Porsche, but it really isn't. Since 1981, the Ruf company in Pfaffhausen, Germany, has been recognized as an independent manufacturer. But the basis for its vehicles comes exclusively from Porsche. A Ruf is even faster and more exclusive than a comparable Porsche.

programme.title: Racetrack, Part 17
programme.desc: Today, we’re featuring the British GT Championship and the European Truck Racing Championship.

programme.title: Ignition GT
programme.desc: Performance meets practicality in the BMW M3 Touring. Renault’s third generation Duster makes its local debut and Ziphorah puts the Lexus RX450h through its paces.

programme.title: Buyer's Guide
programme.desc: We help a first-time buyer in find the perfect vehicle within a R300 000 budget. We search for the ideal bakkie capable of carrying heavy equipment. And we examine the cost of replacing the bearing on a VW Polo 6C

programme.title: Garage Gold
programme.desc: We head to Durban for the Concours D’Elegance. Also, Francisco meets up with Zani who has a special father-daughter story that will melt your hearts. And we have an Austin-Healey vs. an OG Super Boss in our Garage Gold Concourse competition.

programme.title: Petrolheads
programme.desc: We bring you extreme drifting action from the Wild Coast Sun! A VW Golf 6 GTI joins the Drag Kings fray. We take you on a tour of Autostadt in Germany and we meet a mellow yellow Seat Leon Cupra and its passionate owner.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: The Stunt Heroes are still at the ski resort, preparing a spectacular stunt involving a station wagon that is catapulted 50 meters high into the air. The high-flying car is supposed to crash into another car that is placed on a meadow.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: This episode features the most spectacular classic body stunts: jumping from rooftops or the top of a driving cars, falling down staircases, and other potentially bone-breaking daredevilry, including fails and outtakes.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes
programme.desc: Rollovers, ramp jumps, crashes - there are thousands of ways to destroy cars, and the Stunt Heroes produce a lot of wrecks over the course of their adrenaline-filled job. It's a look back at the car stunt highlights of the past episodes.

programme.title: BMW F 800 R
programme.desc: BMW F 800 R is a robust roadster with a lot of spirit, and even motorcycle world champions count on its agility. World champion, Chris Pfeiffer is showing just how much fun you can have with a BMW F 800 R. His work motorcycle is based on the version that you can buy.

programme.title: Ken Block - Gymkhana Grid
programme.desc: Spectacular drifts are to be expected when Ken Block visits the Gymkhana Grid.

programme.title: Ken Block at the Monza Rallye Show
programme.desc: In Monza, Ken Block is set to compete against Allstars from motorsport at the Monza Rally Show.

programme.title: Bentley Mulsanne EWB
programme.desc: The long version of the Bentley Mulsanne is a prime example of a chauffeured limousine. With it, the British luxury car brand has set the bar extremely high when it comes to automotive comfort.

programme.title: Ignition GT
programme.desc: Performance meets practicality in the BMW M3 Touring. Renault’s third generation Duster makes its local debut and Ziphorah puts the Lexus RX450h through its paces.

programme.title: Buyer's Guide
programme.desc: We help a first-time buyer in find the perfect vehicle within a R300 000 budget. We search for the ideal bakkie capable of carrying heavy equipment. And we examine the cost of replacing the bearing on a VW Polo 6C

programme.title: Garage Gold
programme.desc: We head to Durban for the Concours D’Elegance. Also, Francisco meets up with Zani who has a special father-daughter story that will melt your hearts. And we have an Austin-Healey vs. an OG Super Boss in our Garage Gold Concourse competition.
